name: Released version 0.2
body:
Released version 0.2 to PyPI
* CPU Version: https://pypi.org/project/yolo34py/0.2/
* GPU Version: https://pypi.org/project/yolo34py-gpu/0.2/

# Breaking Changes
1) The category labels returned by the pydarknet.Detector.detect() method are now strings. Refer [this commit](https://github.com/madhawav/YOLO3-4-Py/commit/4b26b3ae3de2e12befad9816640779ff03016f88) for details.
2) pydarknet.is_compiled_with_gpu and pydarknet.is_compiled_with_opencv are now methods. Refer [this edit](https://github.com/madhawav/YOLO3-4-Py/commit/ead69d1a5d789372c32269111752f6a612aabe30#diff-d9a8d4954d9b139de7515212681f84fc8610ea2c73b927347b4effeed4c3128dR10) for details.

# Other Changes
1) Improved docstrings.
2) Various code clean-ups.
